mapper.select: SELECT id, email FROM member WHERE ACTIVE = 'on' AND id IN ( SELECT id FROM login_history GROUP BY id HAVING MAX(logindate) < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pw_history WHERE NO IN( SELECT NO FROM( SELECT NO , change_date , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY id ORDER BY change_date DESC) rn FROM pw_history) AS rn2 WHERE rn > 5 )
